channel.title: Banning Glitch
channel.description:
[b][b]You know how some lags get bad enough to make the world completely black? There is a type of lag way worse. It [u]bans[/u] you! I [u]don't know[/u] if it is a [u]permanent or temporary[/u] ban yet. No Mods or Admins were on when I was banned so it couldn't have been from misbehavior. I checked and this has not just happened to me but quite a few others at the same exact time. I am waiting for a reply from AARisAIR to help me but I thought I should warn people about this and believe that it might need to be looked into.[/b]
This letter is meant for the good intention of newbies and others who do not know about this.[/b]
[b][i]----T.G.---[/i][/b]

item.title: Banning Glitch
item.dc:creator: @thatguy176 thatguy176
item.description:
@thatguy176 wrote:

Nice quotes javaisnotrecognized. I like them. :D[br][size=1]Posted on: April 15, 2007, 04:25:17 PM[/size][hr]Well…I’m screwed since I’m pretty sure AARisAIR quit so…umm…yeah…I guess this reply kind of counts as spam…

Read full topic

Well, considering there shouldn’t be any latency at ALL unless there are 300+ people on a server that uses dial up, … um … well that’s that then.

item.title: Banning Glitch
item.dc:creator: @thatguy176 thatguy176
item.description:
@thatguy176 wrote:

There are mutes, temporary bans, and then permenent bans. I don’t know which one of the three this lag/glitch does but it is harmful. I had every rare a non-admin could have except zammorak and some stuff only mods could have and this really bad lag last night made me lose them all.

Read full topic

item.title: Banning Glitch
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

I meant when you said this:

thatguy176:

I don’t know if it is a permanent or temporary ban yet.

implying there are such things as “permanent bans”.

Read full topic

item.title: Banning Glitch
item.dc:creator: @thatguy176 thatguy176
item.description:
@thatguy176 wrote:

It’s true though. It has happened to me and quite a few others. Me and 4 other people got banned when no Mods or Admins were on. I was just training attack and all of a sudden…“WTF!” I’m friends with all the mods and all the admins but 1. The one admin wasn’t on either though.

Read full topic

@thatguy176 wrote:

[b]You know how some lags get bad enough to make the world completely black? There is a type of lag way worse. It bans you! I don’t know if it is a permanent or temporary ban yet. No Mods or Admins were on when I was banned so it couldn’t have been from misbehavior. I checked and this has not just happened to me but quite a few others at the same exact time.
I am waiting for a reply from AARisAIR to help me but I thought I should warn people about this and believe that it might need to be looked into.

This letter is meant for the good intention of newbies and others who do not know about this.[/b]
